mapper.select: select * from v_wfuiwizard t1 where wfuiwizardid=#{id}
select * from v_wfuiwizard t1 where wfuiwizardid=#{id}

select * from v_wfuiwizard t1 where wfuiwizardid=#{id}
select * from v_wfuiwizard t1 where wfuiwizardid=#{id}
select * from v_wfuiwizard t1 where wfuiwizardid=#{id}
mapper.sql: SELECT t1.ACTIONMODE, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.DATAINFO, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.WFSTEPVALUE, t1.WFUIWIZARDID, t1.WFUIWIZARDNAME FROM t_WFUIWIZARD t1
SELECT t1.`ACTIONMODE`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`DATAINFO`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`WFSTEPVALUE`, t1.`WFUIWIZARDID`, t1.`WFUIWIZARDNAME` FROM `t_WFUIWIZARD` t1
SELECT t1.ACTIONMODE, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.DATAINFO, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.WFSTEPVALUE, t1.WFUIWIZARDID, t1.WFUIWIZARDNAME FROM t_WFUIWIZARD t1

SELECT t1.ACTIONMODE AS ACTIONMODE, t1.CREATEDATE AS CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN AS CREATEMAN, t1.DATAINFO AS DATAINFO, t1.UPDATEDATE AS UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN AS UPDATEMAN, t1.WFSTEPVALUE AS WFSTEPVALUE, t1.WFUIWIZARDID AS WFUIWIZARDID, t1.WFUIWIZARDNAME AS WFUIWIZARDNAME FROM t_WFUIWIZARD t1

SELECT t1.ACTIONMODE AS ACTIONMODE, t1.CREATEDATE AS CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN AS CREATEMAN, t1.DATAINFO AS DATAINFO, t1.UPDATEDATE AS UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN AS UPDATEMAN, t1.WFSTEPVALUE AS WFSTEPVALUE, t1.WFUIWIZARDID AS WFUIWIZARDID, t1.WFUIWIZARDNAME AS WFUIWIZARDNAME FROM t_WFUIWIZARD t1
SELECT t1.[ACTIONMODE], t1.[CREATEDATE], t1.[CREATEMAN], t1.[DATAINFO], t1.[UPDATEDATE], t1.[UPDATEMAN], t1.[WFSTEPVALUE], t1.[WFUIWIZARDID], t1.[WFUIWIZARDNAME] FROM [t_WFUIWIZARD] t1
